t: Katatonia - The Fall Of Hearts ( 2 Lp Gatefold Sleeve ) - Amazon.com Music
s: L'ultimo lavoro dei Katatonia non ha deluso le mie aspettative. Seguo questa band da sempre e la mia opinione è che gli ultimi album hanno raggiunto un alto livello di qualità compositiva. La musica risulta molto avvolgente e intima. Va ascoltato molte volte affinché entri in circolo, poi non si potrà più smettere di ascoltarlo. ... The album came but not as I expected, it should be sealed like fresh from the vinyl ...

Katatonia - Jhva Elohim Meth - 140gm Vinyl - Amazon.com Music
s: Katatonia was formed in Sweden in 1991 by Anders Nyström and Jonas Renkse. The debut album, 'Dance of December Souls', was released in 1993, gaining them recognition for their eclectic brand of gothic doom/death & black metal.

t: Katatonia - Sanctitude - Amazon.com Music
s: Another great release from Katatonia. My only complaint is that Idle Blood is too late in the set. Jonas has some trouble hitting the high notes in that one, and it unfortunately detracts from what is an incredible intimate performance. Vinyl gatefold is packaged and presented very nicely.
